name: The Quest for Instant Noodles
description:
The Quest for Instant Noodles is an wave- based, action RPG inspired by games such as 'The Binding of Isaac' and 'The Legend of Zelda'. You play as a random college student, trying to fight trough waves of monsters with your sword and magic abilities, in an attempt to win the glorious award of an unlimited supply of instant noodles.

Featues:
  • Fun, addicting combat, reminiscent of game such as The Legend of Zelda.
  • Three different 'arenas' to fight in, each with their own boss to fight.
  • Loveable, difficult, but fair monsters to fight.
  • Unique, unlockable magic spells.
  • NPCs with wacky dialogue to interact with.
  • Energetic music by Rolemusic. Upbeat audio by myself.
  • Retro, 16 bit-esc graphics.

Credits:

  • Music:
      • Rolemusic - Check out his/ her stuff!
      • Visager - Same as above.
  • Everything else:
      • Me (Guurd) - Feel free to report any bugs you found or feel free to criticize the game. I want to try to improve myself!
